Step 10 - Exercise: FizzBuzz

Time has come for a classic exercise. Yaay!

Count from 1 to 50 and print the numbers out:

  • If a number is a multiple of three, print ‘Fizz’.
  • If it’s a multiple of 5, print ‘Buzz’.
  • If it’s a multiple of 3 and 5, print ‘FizzBuzz’.
  • For everything else, print the number itself.

Note: You may wish to use arithmetic operator remainder (%):

for( var i = 0; i < 50; i ++){
    if(i % 15 == 0){
        console.log("FizzBuzz");
    }
    else if(i % 3 == 0){
        console.log("Fizz");
    }
    else if(i % 5 == 0){
        console.log("Buzz");
    }
    else {
        console.log(i);
    }
}
Go to Step 11
